Text:
Hey Jacquesketch,

Not bad for a first try. Picture 6, Audio 10.  Its watchable, but here's some tips.  Try some different I-frame/B-frame settings, sometimes when the angle changes, you see huge blocks. Also letter-box takes me back to the nineties, you should really crop those away. Thanks, keep up the good work!
Dude, the film IS from the nineties, and I'd rather keep everything there than crop it away :(.
